name: GogoAnime - Anime - Blue Haze
description: Want a better experience for GogoAnime Well then here you go! This will completely remove the yellow theme, it removes ads and improves video performance, it's fully compatible for the GogoAnime.[Io][Tv][Es]+[Mobile] sites + it comes with a sweet selection of wallpapers, you can also choose how many video players you want. This style is used best with Ghostery + Adblockplus.

user.name: Rahimichi

My user-styles make badly designed websites look better.

So download them and enjoy them, also leave a nice review if possible please.

Message me for any site requests.

additional_info: Status: Complete - Maintenance: 3 Update details - tweaks logo fixed. new ad black box removed. Tip: Don't upload wallpapers from computer, upload them on imgur and then copy its image address here.
